    public class MetricServiceImpl

      • getMetrics

        public java.util.List<ThresholdMetric> getMetrics(int periodInHours)
        Returns an ArrayList full of data on the performance of containers. First, it creates local values and assigns them the thresholds for memory, CPU, and disk use. Then it finds out how many Containers are running. Next, it collects a List of all of the containers that are 75% or more of the way to breaching their use defined thresholds, and then all of the containers that have breached those thresholds. From there, it creates the ArrayList it will return, and populates it with an hour-by-hour breakdown of what containers are in which state. Once that list is complete, it is returned.
        Specified by:
        getMetrics in interface MetricService
        Parameters:
        periodInHours -
        Returns:
        List
